A look at what can reopen in each phase of Massachusetts’ opening planGovernor Charlie Baker on Monday released more specific details of his four-phase reopening plan for Massachusetts. Here’s a look at what can open under each phase of the plan.
Key takeaways from Baker’s reopening plan for Massachusetts

Scientists say Baker’s reopening plan is sensible, but still concerningSeveral epidemiologists said a second wave of infection is possible, likely even. They noted a return to church and worship services could be especially problematic.
Read the full details of the Massachusetts reopening plan

‘Reopening does not mean back to normal,’ Mayor Walsh says“Beginning to reopen the economy does not mean the risk of contracting the virus is gone," Walsh said. And a city councilor fears the reopening plans will give people a false sense of security.
